name: Sepehr Rostamzadeh
title: Autonomous Rover Project Lead
bio: I’ve been interested in space exploration and experimentation ever since I learned about the possibility of life outside of Earth. I hope to utilize my experiences from working in Pieter Abbeel’s AI Robotics Lab and in Aerospace SAE to help design for the various projects in which STAC will participate. I’m extremely excited to see what this group of bright, passionate engineers can accomplish!
